name: Ghosts N' Graves V1.2
description:
Ghosts n' Graves

Controls!

- WASD or Arrow keys to Move

- Space bar to Jump

- Hold spacebar to glide

- Let go of spacebar to drop faster

Credits:

Keyvan - Sprite Art, Music

Brayden - Programming, Level Design

Gary - Environmental Art

Dev - Sound Effects

Wes Jefferies - Flying Enemy Programming
